title: Augusta County: Frances Sheets to Daniell Rife, Elizabeth Rife, and Nancy Shurley, August 1, 1859
summary: Daniell Rife, Elizabeth Rife, Nancy Shurley, and Frances Sheets write to their aunt and uncle, telling them of the health of the family, inquiring their health, and requesting them to write back.
keywords: Women, Family, Church/Religious Activity, American Civil War
